name: Titanium.UI.iOS.ListViewStyle
summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the style property of Titanium.UI.ListView.

constants.name: GROUPED
constants.summary: A list view whose sections present distinct groups of rows. The section headers and footers do not float.

constants.name: PLAIN
constants.summary: A plain list view. Any section headers or footers are displayed as inline separators and float when the list view is scrolled.
